name: TRAYVON, THE DISTANT
description:
A rather short proof of concept for an RPG following a young boy looking to put an end to the turmoils taking place within his city.

Music graciously done by D.C Harmony, check out his channel & Itch profile here:

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCXBOrQvsz5M3Q2U9dRuToMQ

https://dc-harmony.itch.io
